title.rendered: Patrols through Unseasonal Rains – CCT’s Determination

content.rendered:
?️ PATROLS THROUGH UNSEASONAL RAINS – CCT’s determination in protecting nature and biodiversity ?️

?️ Under unseasonal downpours, the Community Conservation Team (CCT) braved the storm, strengthening patrol efforts to keep the forests of Chư Yang Sin free from snares.

?️ For 13 days and nights, the team endured relentless rain, with their clothes barely drying before being soaked again. The heavy mist and downpours made it even harder to detect poachers’ tracks and hidden snares.
However, spotting fresh wildlife droppings fueled their determination. Despite the challenges, the CCT pressed on in their February patrols, achieving:
? 85km patrolled through Chư Yang Sin’s ancient forests
?️ 64 hours of patrols
? 286 snares removed
?️ 2 illegal camps dismantled

? Join CCT in protecting these majestic forests and Vietnam’s rich biodiversity – preserving nature for ourselves and generations to come!

#WildAct #WeActforWildlife #CCT #CommunityConservationTeam #Wildlife #Ranger
